DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the relative bioequivalency of generic Haloperidol tablets versus Haldol in normal volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioequivalency of Generic Haloperidol Tablets Versus Haldol in Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
